overview: Mr. Stephens joined the Company in 1996 as Chief Technology Officer tasked with ensuring Manatron solutions were positioned as market leaders. Prior to joining Manatron, Mr. Stephens was a Manager in the Office of Information Technology at Western Michigan University where he led early migrations from mainframe to client/server and packaged ERP implementations. Mr. Stephens is primarily responsible for corporate strategy, mergers and acquisitions and managing the Companyâ€™s sales and marketing efforts.
